alert.note: Alert for Allegan; Barry; Kent; Muskegon; Newaygo; Ottawa (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 06 at 9:58PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...Thunderstorms will impact portions of Allegan, Kent, Ottawa, southern Newaygo, Barry and Muskegon Counties through MIDNIGHT EDT... At 954 PM EDT, trained weather spotters reported a strong thunderstorm over Muskegon, moving southeast at 30 mph. This thunderstorm produced half inch in diameter hail in Muskegon. Conditions are favorable tonight for additional thunderstorm development through midnight. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, pea size hail and heavy downpours. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids... Muskegon... Holland... Grand Haven... Hastings... Allegan... Newaygo... Wyoming... Kentwood... Walker... Grandville... Muskegon Heights... East Grand Rapids... Hudsonville... Rockford... Zeeland... Coopersville... Sparta... Fremont... Wayland... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is occurring with the ongoing storms which may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Allegan; Barry; Kent; Muskegon; Newaygo; Ottawa
